Name: PornVault
Overview: 💋 Manage your ever-growing porn collection. Using Vue & GraphQL
CAComment: There are some complications in getting this app to work. See HERE for more information. This app *may* eventually be removed from CA due to this

WebUI port.Name: WebUI port
WebUI port.Description: The port for the porn-vault webinterface

Config directory.Name: Config directory
Config directory.Description: Directory for persistent files (config file, database, backups...)

Images import directory.Name: Images import directory
Images import directory.Description: Images stored here will be shown in the WebUI under 'Images'

Videos import directory.Name: Videos import directory
Videos import directory.Description: Videos stored here will be shown in the WebUI under 'Scenes'

Uploaded images directory.Name: Uploaded images directory
Uploaded images directory.Description: Images added through the WebUI are stored here. By default this is inside the config directory
